paper_abstract: In this paper, the Homotopy Perturbation Method (HPM) has been implemented for solving the extended Fisher-Kolomogrov-Petrovskii-Piskunov (FKPP) equation. The HPM is an approximate method which yields an analytical solution in the form of a convergent power series with components, which can be easily computed. We show that the HPM can generate highly accurate solutions for the FKPP equation.
paper_title: The Solution of Fisher-Kolomogrov-Petrovskii-Piskunov equation by the Homotopy Perturbation Method
